Uses of CBRTerm in jcolibri.cbrcase
 

Subinterfaces of CBRTerm in jcolibri.cbrcase
 interface CBRCase
          Interface that will represent any Case structure built to be used on JColibrí
 interface CBRCaseBase
          This interface defines the methods that at least any Case Base must implement to be transparently used by the methods on the framework
 interface CBRQuery
          Represents a CBR query over the system
 

Classes in jcolibri.cbrcase that implement CBRTerm
 class BasicCBRCaseBase
          BasicCBRCaseBase is a simple linear implementation of the interface CBRCaseBase.
 class CaseEvalList
          Data structure containing a set of CaseEvaluation objects, that holds a case and a object that represents an evaluation of the case.
 class CaseEvaluation
          Data structure containing a case and a object that represents its evaluation
 class CBRCaseRecord
          Simple attribute-value CBRCase strucutre.
 class CBRGenericQuery
          Generic query for a CBR Application.
 

Uses of CBRTerm in jcolibri.cbrcore
 

Classes in jcolibri.cbrcore that implement CBRTerm
 class CBRGlobalSimilarity
          Represents the concept Global Similarity Function of CBROnto.
 class CBRLocalSimilarity
          Represents the concept Local Similarity Function of CBROnto.
 class CBRMethod
          Represnts any method that will solve a CBRTask on this system.
 class CBRSimilarity
          Represents the concept Similarity function of CBROnto.
 class CBRTask
          Represent the task concept inside the framework.

Uses of CBRTerm in jcolibri.extensions.textual.method
 

Classes in jcolibri.extensions.textual.method that implement CBRTerm
 class BasicIEMethod
           Extracts texts information and stores it in case individuals (if defined).
 class CasesIRMethod
           Decomposition method assigned to "Cases IR tasks".
 class DomainTopicClassifierMethod
           Associates a Topic using extracted Features and Phrases as conditions.
 class ExtractFeaturesMethod
           Extracts features using Regular Expressions.
 class ExtractNamesMethod
           Selects the main names of the text.
 class ExtractPhrasesMethod
           Extracts Phrases using Regular Expressions.
 class GlossaryRelationsMethod
           Relates query words to cases words using a domain specific glossary.
 class KeywordLayerMethod
           Decomposition method assigned to "Keyword Layer".
 class PartofSpeechMethod
           This method uses a Maximum Entropy tagger (Opennlp) to assign Part-of-Speech tags.
 class RetrieveTextualCasesMethod
           Decomposition method assigned to "Retrieve Task".
 class SetupTextualCasesMethod
           Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
 class SkipThisTaskMethod
           Empty method that can be used when user doesn't want to include a layer.
 class StemmerMethod
           This method can perform several stemmer algorithms for diferent languages.
 class TextRelationsMethod
           Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
 class TextualCBRPreProcessMethod
           Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
 class TextualCBRRetrieveMethod
           Decomposition method assigned to "Retrieve Task".
 class TextualPreCycleMethod
           Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)
 class WordNetRelationsMethod
           Relates query words to cases words using WordNet.
 class WordsFilterMethod
          Filters the text removing stop-words and special characters.

Uses of CBRTerm in jcolibri.method
 

Classes in jcolibri.method that implement CBRTerm
 class CBRSystemMethod
          Method that solves the CBR System task by decomposition in Precycle, Cycle and Postcycle.
 class CloseConnectorMethod
          Close the connection to the CBRCaseBase.
 class CombineQueryAndCasesMethod
          Simple adaptation method.
 class ConfigureQueryMethod
          Reads the structure of the case from a file and build a frame dynamically that can be used to introduce the values of the query.
 class CopyCasesforAdaptationMethod
          Copies the cases in the context.
 class DirectCopyMethod
          Simple adaptation method.
 class LoadCaseBaseMethod
          Opens the connection to the CBRCase base and loads all the cases in the context.
 class ManualRevisionMethod
          Builds a frame using the case structure file to display the cases in the context to the user.
 class NumericDirectProportionMethod
          Simple adaptation method.
 class NumericSimComputationMethod
          Computes the similarities between the query and each case in the context.
 class PostCycleMethod
          Method that solve the precycle task by decomposition.
 class PreCycleMethod
          Method that solve the precycle task by decomposition.
 class RetainChooserMethod
          Builds a frame using the case structure file and shows the cases in the context to the user.
 class RetainComputationalMethod
          Solves the Retain Task by decomposition.
 class RetrieveComputationalMethod
          Solve the Retrive Task by decomposition.
 class ReuseComputationalMethod
          Solves the Reuse Task by decomposition.
 class SelectAllCasesMethod
          Sets all the cases from the CBRCaseBase in the context.
 class SelectBestCaseMethod
          Select the first case in the context and discard the remainders.
 class SelectSomeCasesMethod
          Select the first n cases from the context and discard the remainders.
 class StoreCasesMethod
          Adds the cases in the context to the CBRCaseBase.
